data.eml:eml: A new species of Asthenopus (Ephemeroptera: Polymitarcyidae: Asthenopodinae) from Brazil and Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Molineri, Carlos, Cruz, Paulo Vilela, Emmerich, Daniel (2011): A new species of Asthenopus (Ephemeroptera: Polymitarcyidae: Asthenopodinae) from Brazil and Colombia. Zootaxa 2750: 33-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276675
